mapper.insert: INSERT INTO concert_tb ( show_no, show_name, show_price, show_round, show_content1, show_content2, show_time1, show_time2, show_poster, show_startdate, show_closedate, show_status, concert_artist, concert_genre, concert_bandname ) VALUES ( concert_seq.NEXTVAL, #{show_name}, #{show_price}, #{show_round}, #{show_content1}, #{show_content2}, #{show_time1}, #{show_time2}, #{show_poster}, #{show_startdate}, #{show_closedate}, #{show_status}, #{concert_artist}, #{concert_genre}, #{concert_bandname} )
mapper.select: SELECT show_no, show_name, show_round, show_time1, show_time2, show_startdate, show_closedate, show_price, show_status FROM concert_tb ORDER BY show_no DESC
